name: Amelia's birthday game
description:
Summary:

Play as a slightly bloated cat and collect as much radioactive fish as you can (130). Intended to be played by Amelia Kilby or her friends made by her brother: Ben Kilby not on behalf of DLX INTERACTIVE

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys

Space to jump

(that's it)

To unlock rage powerup, collect 5 fish

Obligation:

BY LOOKING AT THIS PAGE YOU HAPPILY ACCEPT THAT BEN SHOULDN'T BE DONE FOR COPYRIGHT DUE TO SOME ASSETS IN THE GAME HAVING UNSPECIFIED USING RIGHTS AND THE GAME WAS RUSHED
